list_definition.definition: the disappearance of the whole or part of the sun when the moon comes between it and the earth, or of the moon when the earth’s shadow falls across it

list_definition.definition: to obscure or cut off the light or sight of (the sun or moon)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The sun was partially eclipsed at 9 a.m.
